description: This table contains the historical information for comments on why a finding or procedure was removed from the patient's chart.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the historical instant in the dental finding or procedure record. Together with FINDING_ID, this forms the foreign key to the DENT_RMV_CMT_HX table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple�comments�associated with the�finding or procedure�and the�historical instant�from the DENT_RMV_CMT_HX�table

columns.name: DENTAL_RMV_CMT_HX
columns.description: The history of the comment for why a finding or procedure was removed from a patient's Tooth Chart
